articles.title: Residents concerned after mysterious drones seen flying over northeastern Colorado
articles.description: The first sighting was on Dec. 17.
articles.content:
A series of mysterious drones have been spotted flying over several counties in northeastern Colorado.
Sheriff Tom Nestor of Lincoln County told ABC News there have been two confirmed reports of drone sightings in his county over open areas such as ranches. … [+899 chars]

articles.title: Judge temporarily blocks California's forced arbitration law
articles.description: A federal judge is temporarily blocking a new California law outlawing mandatory arbitration agreements
articles.content:
SACRAMENTO, Calif. -- 
A federal judge on Monday temporarily blocked a new California law outlawing mandatory arbitration agreements that critics say can make it more difficult for workers to sue their bosses for sexual harassment.

Enbridge Inc. said Monday that it retrieved a 45-foot steel rod that was resting against an underwater oil pipeline where lakes Michigan and Huron converge.
